content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command from you to execute a shell command to echo a message about finding online communities and forums for language learning resource recommendations. The command returned a message with the list of communities and a request for suggestions on which one to join. You recently sent a command to execute a shell command asking for suggestions on which communities or forums to join, and the response was a message asking for recommendations.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "online communities or forums for language learning resource recommendations"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://preply.com/en/blog/7-language-communities-to-improve-your-language-skills/", "https://lib.dinecollege.edu/blog/Navajo-Language-Resources-Community-Forum", "https://www.nypl.org/blog/2012/11/28/11-great-free-websites-practice-english", "https://www.fluentu.com/blog/french/french-language-forum/", "https://community.canvaslms.com/", "https://www.oecd.org/education/Supporting-the-continuation-of-teaching-and-learning-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.pdf", "https://unesdoc.unesco.org/ark:/48223/pf0000128515", "https://americanenglish.state.gov/"]'}]
"""
